item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: Oh my god, it's really there!

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: How did you think of that, Elm? Are you some kind of psychic?

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: Well, now that we're outside, I may as well tell you a bit about the village.

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: We aren't very big, if you couldn't already tell. We've got a blacksmith, a ranch, a doctor, and a handful of villagers.

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: They're all really nice people! I'll introduce you.

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: Although... a word of warning. Some of them might not be super amicable right now.

item found.Name: Elm
item found.Text: I thought you just said they were all really nice?

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: They are!! I promise. It's just that...

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: The mayor went missing about a week ago.

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: Mr. Diaz. One of the best men I know. Everyone in the village loves him. But no one's heard anything from him for a week now.

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: No one really knows all the details. His wife just woke up one day and there was no trace of him anywhere in the house.

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: We searched the whole village, too. No dice.

item found.Name: Elm
item found.Text: (How does a whole person just go missing? Strange...)

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: Anyways, that's all to say that the villagers might be a bit preoccupied. But I'm sure they'd love to meet you!

item found.Name: Kai
item found.Text: Come on. Let's go meet Hank. He works at the ranch. Should be just northeast of here.
